name: Tags with Hover Effect
description:
*Works best with Figma's beta Interactive Components feature.


Make an icon appear over a badge when hovered. Great for removable tags, or swap out the X for a different icon for different hover actions.


With clever use of a negative X property, the icon will appear on top of the text itself rather than beside it, which maintains the width of the badge.


Auto Layout lets the tags auto-adjust to the correct size.


UPDATE: Jul 13, 2021

Fixed bug where badge changes width slightly on hover. The badge now remains the same width even on hover.
